channel.title: How does it feel
channel.description:
that rsc's best pker was a girl
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sjmM34Wl9KA

item.title: How does it feel
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Pompano21, post:45, topic:412509”][quote author=NoLives link=topic=513771.msg3739096#msg3739096 date=1315203749]

[quote author=Kryptix link=topic=513771.msg3739089#msg3739089 date=1315203186]

So why does that mean I ruined RSC or whatever?
[/quote]Was talking about rsce (your server) but never mind it, as ain’t nothing worth to talk about it so God bless you and all the rsc community!

Please see the latest poll o n the RSCE homepage…
[/quote]Dear sir, I regret to announce, the less people are interested in making private servers, the faster rsc will die.
You have caused all other private servers to die, therefore, you are the sole reason as to why rsc is dying.
Other people ddosed out of grudge, but you do it to draw people to your server.
Please, leave with some dignity left and let the people actually interested in rsc keep it alive.

Do you have proof of him DDOSING? Probably not, so stfu[/quote]Was he really that good in bed?

Read full topic

Please, leave with some dignity left and let the people actually interested in rsc keep it alive.[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:

[/quote]Was talking about rsce (your server) but never mind it, as ain’t nothing worth to talk about it so God bless you and all the rsc community!

Please see the latest poll o n the RSCE homepage…[/quote]Dear sir, I regret to announce, the less people are interested in making private servers, the faster rsc will die.
You have caused all other private servers to die, therefore, you are the sole reason as to why rsc is dying.
Other people ddosed out of grudge, but you do it to draw people to your server.
Please, leave with some dignity left and let the people actually interested in rsc keep it alive.

item.title: How does it feel

item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:7, topic:412566”]So why does that mean I ruined RSC or whatever?[/quote]Was talking about rsce (your server) but never mind it, as ain’t nothing worth to talk about it so God bless you and all the rsc community!

Read full topic

item.title: How does it feel
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:6, topic:412566”]How have I ruined it?

Why hasn’t RSCAngel, RSCDaemon, RSCDevil (or any other semi-replica RSC private server) ruined it?

And no, I can’t figure out what I’m missing… Everyone has a different opinion, just because you’re so convinced you know what’s right (which you haven’t actually said) doesn’t mean every other player agrees with you.[/quote]I’m sorry if i offended you but common man you don’t need anyone to tell you what was the most you did enjoy on RSC, it is your own experience not mine not others.

But i can tell you my own I did play rsc on an old laptop with 64m of ram, win98 and dial-up connection (you know what that means on wilderness :p) but i it wont stop me to go to castle because i never know what could happen up there. It was so random that i could not get bored of it, i never know who will i fight or what was the stats of the other guy, or what items could have. It was not predictable and it something that rsce lost long ago.

Read full topic

um ok never seen you pk kryptix? so why dont you make a one day week pk server ill call you rsc god

item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

latifundio:

Ironical that someone who enjoyed pking so much can ruin it so bad, can’t you figure out what are you missing?

Its not so much about what he knows is missing, as it is about the steady milk flow he still gets without doing anything.

item.title: How does it feel
item.dc:creator: @islphrs islphrs
item.description:
@islphrs wrote:

nacional:

mystic why don’t you ever make a video?

Well for one, I’ve never made a video in my life (put multiple clips together) and I don’t even know how lol. Though I’m sure I could easily figure it out, there is one other reason. I have recorded myself pking before on RSCE because for a while people were calling me an acer every time they fought me. The problem is, when I recorded using hypercam (free) it would cause me to lag just a little bit, but enough to have an effect on my pking. I have a bunch of clips, though, some are even pretty leet, if I do say so myself (me getting 3v1d fucking around in ruby ammy+ rune chain+ gloves and 3hitting ppl) but when I go to upload those clips to youtube it takes fucking AGES and drastically increases my latency as it’s using all my bandwidth (10 mb/s down, 2ish up). So yah…

tl;dr: I cbf making one.

Read full topic

item.title: How does it feel
item.dc:creator: @Slysteeler Slysteeler
item.description:
@Slysteeler wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:2, topic:412566”][quote author=islphrs link=topic=513771.msg3734409#msg3734409 date=1314833936]

She wasn’t though. She wasn’t even good. She was just one of the very few people who first started to upload PK videos of which all the non-PKers watched in disbelief. She’d regularly run on site of me as well as most people I PK’d with.

By far the best PKers on RSC were Sue Me and Adx1. As a team they were unstoppable pretty much. It used to be me, Adx1, Sue Me, Zorro Toy and Lord Vid. We’d make a good group.

This.

When adx started MI I pked with all of those people as well (though I was only 82 70 99 with 1 mage on rsc) and my god I must have pked 60 sets when I was in MI.

Also, I (and most good pkers on rsce) would smash the “great” pkers of that time. All they had were the stats and gp to afford casts at a time when a lot of pkers didn’t cast at all.
[/quote]
I agree and disagree…

Their stats did them a lot of favours yeah, I was ‘only’ 85hp and would get destroyed by 99hp’s most of the time, but I’ve never seen anyone catch like we used to on RSC, there’s just no need… I’ve PK’d a LOT on private servers and haven’t seen anyone put 20-40 catches together like you’d see on RSC, I remember literally catching people every direction from level 40 wilderness until they ran out of levels at 8 wilderness or whatever lol, that never happened on private servers in my experience

Probably a lot to do with the latency though… No private server has ever been as fast as PK’ing on a London server on RSC, even though internet speeds are 10x faster now.[/quote]

yeh becoz the latency is no where as fast as the jagex servers and the private servers these days r constantly being ddos’d

Read full topic

item.title: How does it feel
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

islphrs:

I’ve caught plenty of people dead, and seen plenty of people being caught dead, for as many catches as it took. Pretty sure you’ve even seen me (calculate) do it on rsce whenever you used to ::invis watch me all the time ;). Might not have been 40 catches, but it takes at least 15-20.

Ive been 1sqd by you many times when i used to play rsce. I want to know, do you find catching fun when there is no delay?

If i think about it, i would prefer 300ms for the fact that it makes catching for me unpredictable. Sometimes i have to click in the direction i think they will run, because if i waiting to see i would be too far behind to make that catch, and when i get lucky and it works…i have the biggest smile.

Read full topic

Probably a lot to do with the latency though… No private server has ever been as fast as PK’ing on a London server on RSC, even though internet speeds are 10x faster now.[/quote]

I’ve caught plenty of people dead, and seen plenty of people being caught dead, for as many catches as it took. Pretty sure you’ve even seen me (calculate) do it on rsce whenever you used to ::invis watch me all the time ;). Might not have been 40 catches, but it takes at least 15-20.

Who cares what gender it was? Lets move on from 2nd grade please?

Read full topic

item.title: How does it feel
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:3, topic:412566”][quote author=nacional link=topic=513771.msg3734657#msg3734657 date=1314848646]
did you make any videos? i heard you ac’d a lot
[/quote]
I was 100% legit until RSC was coming to an end and everyone was moving to RS2. I could see the future (forcing us to quit or play RS2) so just pissed around with google mainly because I was amazed at the programming behind it and idolized Kaitnieks. Kryptix got banned in late 2005 but the reality is, as soon as I started using google for a few PK trips everyone just presumed I must have AC’d the whole time, even when I was legit etc…[/quote]You being legit?
Feels shady man.

Read full topic
